faqs.question: How do I create an account on Zunto?
faqs.answer: Download the Zunto app or visit our website and tap 'Sign Up'. You can register using your email, phone number, or Google login. Complete the verification process to unlock all buying and selling features.

faqs.question: Do I need to verify my email or phone number?
faqs.answer: Yes. Verification helps maintain account security and reduces fraudulent listings. You will receive a verification code via SMS or email to complete your registration.

faqs.question: Why am I not receiving my verification code?
faqs.answer: This may occur due to network delays or email filtering. Check your spam or junk folder, wait a few minutes, then tap 'Resend Code' if needed.

faqs.question: Can I use Zunto without an account?
faqs.answer: You can browse listings without an account, but you must register to chat with sellers, save items, or complete transactions.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen, enter your registered email or phone number, and follow the instructions sent to you to create a new password.

faqs.question: What should I do if I forget my login email or phone?
faqs.answer: Check previous Zunto notifications in your email or messages. If you still cannot locate your credentials, contact support with proof of account ownership.

faqs.question: How do I update my email or phone number?
faqs.answer: Navigate to Settings > Account Information and select the field you wish to update. You will be required to verify the new details for security purposes.

faqs.question: Why is my account restricted or suspended?
faqs.answer: Accounts may be restricted due to suspicious activity, policy violations, fraudulent listings, or multiple user reports. You will receive a notification explaining the reason and any available remediation steps.

faqs.question: Can I have multiple accounts?
faqs.answer: Multiple accounts are discouraged to prevent fraudulent activity. Operating multiple accounts may trigger security measures and result in restrictions.

faqs.question: How do I delete my account?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security and select 'Delete Account'. Once confirmed, your data and listings will be permanently removed within a few days.

faqs.question: Can I recover a deleted account?
faqs.answer: No. Account deletion is permanent. You will need to create a new account if you wish to use Zunto again.

faqs.question: What personal information is required to register?
faqs.answer: We require your name, email or phone number, and a password. Additional details may be requested when you initiate transactions.

faqs.question: Is my personal information secure?
faqs.answer: Yes. Zunto uses industry-standard encryption and does not share your personal data with third parties without your consent.

faqs.question: Why was my account flagged for unusual activity?
faqs.answer: This is a security measure triggered by suspicious login attempts, chat patterns, or listing behaviour. Follow the on-screen prompts to verify your identity.

faqs.question: How do I switch from a buyer to a seller account?
faqs.answer: All Zunto accounts can both buy and sell. To start selling, simply create your first listing. You may complete additional seller verification for enhanced credibility.

faqs.question: How do I restore a restricted account?
faqs.answer: Follow the instructions provided during login or contact Zunto Support with relevant details to request a review of your account status.

faqs.question: What is a Verified User on Zunto?
faqs.answer: Verified users have completed identity verification, which may include phone number, email, or ID confirmation. They display a verification badge on their profile.

faqs.question: Do I need to be verified to sell?
faqs.answer: Verification is not mandatory, but verified sellers receive increased visibility and buyer trust.

faqs.question: How do I verify my account?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Verification and follow the prompts. Options may include phone number verification, email confirmation, or ID submission.

faqs.question: Are verified accounts guaranteed to be safe?
faqs.answer: Verification significantly reduces fraudulent accounts but does not guarantee every transaction. Always exercise caution and follow safe trading practices.

faqs.question: What benefits do verified sellers receive?
faqs.answer: Verified sellers enjoy higher search ranking, a trust badge on their profile, and increased buyer confidence in their listings.

faqs.question: How do I buy an item on Zunto?
faqs.answer: Browse or search for the item you want, review the listing details, and tap 'Chat with Seller' to discuss the product, negotiate price, and arrange payment and meetup or delivery.

faqs.question: Can I negotiate prices with sellers?
faqs.answer: Yes. Zunto supports flexible pricing, and many sellers are open to negotiation unless they indicate 'fixed price'. Use the chat feature to discuss pricing respectfully.

faqs.question: How do I know if a seller is trustworthy?
faqs.answer: Review the seller's ratings, read buyer reviews, check for a verification badge, and assess their response quality in chat before proceeding.

faqs.question: How do I request more details about an item?
faqs.answer: Tap 'Chat with Seller' to ask questions, request additional photos or videos, or clarify product specifications.

faqs.question: Can I purchase multiple items from one seller?
faqs.answer: Yes. Discuss bulk purchases with the seller via chat. Some sellers may offer discounts for multiple items.

faqs.question: What does 'Out of Stock' mean?
faqs.answer: The seller has either sold the item or temporarily paused the listing. You can tap 'Notify Me' to receive an alert if it becomes available again.

faqs.question: Can I save items for later?
faqs.answer: Yes. Add items to your Wishlist to track them. You will receive notifications if the price changes or stock is low.

faqs.question: How do I know if a product is new or used?
faqs.answer: Each listing displays the item condition, such as 'Brand New', 'Like New', 'Fairly Used', or 'Used'. Sellers are required to accurately state the condition.

faqs.question: What should I do if a seller is unresponsive?
faqs.answer: If a seller does not respond within a reasonable time, consider other listings. You may report consistently unresponsive sellers.

faqs.question: How do I avoid fake sellers?
faqs.answer: Check seller reviews and ratings, ask detailed questions, request real photos or videos, and always inspect items before completing payment.

faqs.question: How do I confirm an item is still available?
faqs.answer: Send a message to the seller. Availability is updated manually, so direct confirmation is recommended before arranging a transaction.

faqs.question: Can I block a seller?
faqs.answer: Yes. Open the chat, access the options menu, and select 'Block'. This will prevent further communication from that user.

faqs.question: How do I post a listing?
faqs.answer: Tap 'Sell', upload clear photos of your item, write a detailed description, set your price, and select the appropriate category.

faqs.question: How many items can I list?
faqs.answer: There is no strict limit, but duplicate or spam listings may be removed to maintain marketplace quality.

faqs.question: Why was my listing rejected or removed?
faqs.answer: Listings may be rejected for containing prohibited items, misleading information, low-quality images, or policy violations.

faqs.question: What items are prohibited on Zunto?
faqs.answer: Prohibited items include illegal goods, weapons, counterfeit products, stolen property, explicit content, fake documents, and restricted pharmaceuticals.

faqs.question: Can I edit my listing after posting?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can update photos, price, description, and category at any time from your listing management page.

faqs.question: Why is my listing not appearing in search results?
faqs.answer: Your listing may be under review, flagged for policy review, or require additional information. Check your notifications for updates.

faqs.question: Can I boost my listing for more visibility?
faqs.answer: Listing promotion features are planned for future updates. Currently, high-quality photos and detailed descriptions help improve visibility.

faqs.question: Do I need to describe products honestly?
faqs.answer: Yes. Accurate descriptions are mandatory. Misleading information or hidden defects may result in penalties and negative reviews.

faqs.question: Can I use stock photos for my listing?
faqs.answer: No. Photos must show the actual item being sold. Using stock or misleading images violates Zunto policies.

faqs.question: Can I block buyers?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can block buyers who are unserious, harassing, or disruptive to prevent further contact.

faqs.question: How do I mark an item as sold?
faqs.answer: Once a transaction is complete, update your listing status to 'Sold' or remove the listing from your active inventory.

faqs.question: Can I relist an item that didn't sell?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can refresh or relist items that did not sell. Consider updating your photos, description, or price to attract buyers.

faqs.question: Are digital products supported?
faqs.answer: Yes, but digital products must meet marketplace standards. Delivery confirmation may differ depending on the digital item type.

faqs.question: Can I set different shipping costs for different regions?
faqs.answer: Yes. Regional shipping fees must be clearly indicated in the product listing before purchase.

faqs.question: Can I request advanced payment for custom orders?
faqs.answer: Yes, provided it is clearly stated in the product listing and the buyer agrees to in-app payment terms.

faqs.question: What payment methods are supported on Zunto?
faqs.answer: All in-app payments are processed securely through Paystack, allowing users to pay with cards, bank transfers, or other supported channels.

faqs.question: Is using the in-app payment system compulsory?
faqs.answer: No. Buyers may choose between direct payment to the seller (outside the app) or in-app protected payment through Paystack.

faqs.question: What is the advantage of paying through the app?
faqs.answer: Choosing in-app payment provides buyer protection, secure fund holding via escrow, and platform-managed delivery until the product is successfully received.

faqs.question: What happens if I pay the seller directly outside the app?
faqs.answer: The transaction becomes unprotected. The platform cannot assist with delivery issues, disputes, refunds, or lost items for off-platform payments.

faqs.question: How does the in-app payment process work?
faqs.answer: The buyer pays through Paystack, the platform holds the funds securely in escrow, the product is dispatched through delivery partners, and upon buyer confirmation of delivery, funds are released to the seller.

faqs.question: When is the seller paid?
faqs.answer: The seller receives payment only after the buyer confirms successful delivery of the item.

faqs.question: Does Zunto operate an escrow system?
faqs.answer: Yes. The in-app payment method functions as a secure escrow, holding funds until transaction completion is confirmed.

faqs.question: Is my payment information secure?
faqs.answer: Yes. Paystack uses advanced encryption and industry-standard security protocols to protect all financial data. Sellers never see your card or bank details.

faqs.question: Are there fees for using the in-app payment method?
faqs.answer: Any applicable service or processing fees will be clearly displayed before you complete your payment.

faqs.question: What happens if my payment fails?
faqs.answer: You may retry the transaction or choose another payment method. If funds were debited, Paystack or your bank will automatically reverse the charge.

faqs.question: Can I pay using bank transfer through Paystack?
faqs.answer: Yes. Paystack supports transfers, cards, and other available channels depending on your region.

faqs.question: Can I use a virtual or prepaid card?
faqs.answer: Yes, if the card is supported by Paystack in your region.

faqs.question: Can I save multiple cards for future transactions?
faqs.answer: Yes. Buyers may securely save multiple cards via Paystack for faster checkout.

faqs.question: Can I use international cards?
faqs.answer: Yes, subject to Paystack's supported card networks and regional availability.

faqs.question: Can I pay using mobile wallets?
faqs.answer: Yes. Any wallet or payment method supported by Paystack is valid for in-app transactions.

faqs.question: What currencies are supported?
faqs.answer: Payments are processed in the currency supported by Paystack for your region.

faqs.question: Can I pay for multiple items from different sellers in one transaction?
faqs.answer: Not currently. Each seller's items must be paid for separately to ensure proper tracking and delivery management.

faqs.question: Can I pay for multiple items from the same seller in one transaction?
faqs.answer: Yes. Multiple items from a single seller can be paid for together in one in-app transaction.

faqs.question: Does Zunto support installment payments?
faqs.answer: Not at the moment. All in-app payments must be made in full at checkout.

faqs.question: Can I change my payment method after selecting one?
faqs.answer: No. Once a payment method is chosen for a specific order, it cannot be changed.

faqs.question: Can buyers schedule payments for a future date?
faqs.answer: Not currently. Payments must be processed immediately at checkout.

faqs.question: Does Zunto support recurring payments or subscriptions?
faqs.answer: Not currently. The platform only supports one-time payments.

faqs.question: Are payment receipts provided?
faqs.answer: Yes. Buyers automatically receive digital receipts for every in-app payment, which can be used for tax or accounting purposes.

faqs.question: Will I be notified when payment is processed?
faqs.answer: Yes. Buyers receive an in-app confirmation and may also receive email or SMS alerts depending on settings.

faqs.question: Can sellers track payment status?
faqs.answer: Yes. Sellers can view real-time status of each order including awaiting payment, payment received, delivery in progress, awaiting buyer confirmation, and payment released.

faqs.question: Do sellers need a Paystack account?
faqs.answer: No. Payments collected from buyers are handled by the platform and distributed to sellers automatically.

faqs.question: What happens if the seller's bank rejects the payout?
faqs.answer: The seller will be notified to update their bank details. The platform will retry payment after corrections are made.

faqs.question: How long does it take to release funds to sellers after confirmation?
faqs.answer: Funds are typically released immediately after buyer confirmation, but slight delays may occur due to banking processing times.

faqs.question: Can sellers request early payment before buyer confirmation?
faqs.answer: No. All payments follow the escrow flow. Early disbursement is not permitted for security reasons.

faqs.question: Are sellers charged fees for receiving payments?
faqs.answer: Any applicable fees will be displayed clearly before payment is processed or released.

faqs.question: Can a seller refuse in-app payment and force direct payment?
faqs.answer: No. Buyers retain full control over the payment option they choose.

faqs.question: Can sellers charge extra after payment is made?
faqs.answer: No. All charges must be included in the original listing price. Additional charges after payment are prohibited.

faqs.question: Can sellers set different payment options for different products?
faqs.answer: Yes. Sellers can allow or disallow in-app payments per listing, but buyers retain the final choice for payment method.

faqs.question: Are there transaction limits?
faqs.answer: Yes. Limits may apply to mitigate fraud and comply with regulatory guidelines.

faqs.question: What happens if Paystack experiences downtime?
faqs.answer: Users will be unable to complete in-app payments until the service is restored. No funds will be deducted during downtime.

faqs.question: Are all transactions logged?
faqs.answer: Yes. All payments, refunds, and disputes are securely logged for transparency and audit purposes.

faqs.question: What if a buyer's payment is flagged for review by Paystack?
faqs.answer: The transaction will be temporarily held until Paystack verifies the payment. Buyers may be asked for additional authentication.

faqs.question: How does the platform handle chargebacks?
faqs.answer: Chargebacks are handled according to Paystack's policies. The platform assists with evidence submission and dispute resolution.

faqs.question: What happens if a transaction is reversed by Paystack or the bank?
faqs.answer: The platform will notify both parties. Funds may be temporarily held or refunded depending on the cause.

faqs.question: How does escrow protect buyers?
faqs.answer: When you pay through the app, funds are held securely until you confirm receipt of your item. This ensures sellers only receive payment after successful delivery.

faqs.question: How long are funds held in escrow?
faqs.answer: Funds are held until buyer confirmation. There is no automatic release timer unless future policy updates specify otherwise.

faqs.question: Can buyers verify that funds are safely held before delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes. Escrow status and payment verification are visible in the buyer's account.

faqs.question: Can sellers confirm escrow before shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes. Sellers can verify that funds are securely held before dispatching products.

faqs.question: What happens if the buyer does not confirm delivery?
faqs.answer: If delivery is successful but the buyer does not confirm, the platform may conduct verification. Once confirmed, payment will be released to the seller.

faqs.question: What happens if a buyer refuses delivery without reason?
faqs.answer: The platform reviews delivery evidence. If the refusal is unjustified, the buyer may not be eligible for a refund, and redelivery fees may apply.

faqs.question: Can the platform freeze funds?
faqs.answer: Yes. If there is evidence of fraud, dispute, or policy violations, funds may be held pending investigation.

faqs.question: Are in-app payments insured against loss or fraud?
faqs.answer: Yes. The escrow system and platform policies protect buyers from loss or fraud during transactions.

faqs.question: Can the platform hold payments indefinitely?
faqs.answer: No. Payments are held until delivery confirmation or dispute resolution, not indefinitely.

faqs.question: Are refunds available?
faqs.answer: Yes. Refunds are issued when delivery fails, the item is not delivered, the product significantly differs from its description, or fraud is detected.

faqs.question: Who processes refunds?
faqs.answer: All refunds are handled directly by the platform. Sellers do not issue refunds through personal accounts.

faqs.question: How long does it take to receive a refund?
faqs.answer: Refund timing varies depending on Paystack and your bank, typically ranging from a few hours to 1-7 business days.

faqs.question: Are refunds guaranteed for every in-app payment?
faqs.answer: Refunds are guaranteed only when there is a valid issue, such as delivery failure, fraud, or product misrepresentation.

faqs.question: Can I get a refund if I simply change my mind?
faqs.answer: Change-of-mind refunds may be subject to seller approval unless the order has not yet been dispatched.

faqs.question: Can I cancel an in-app payment after placing an order?
faqs.answer: Cancellation is possible if the seller has not yet shipped the item. After dispatch, cancellation may require a dispute review.

faqs.question: What happens if a seller cancels an order after payment?
faqs.answer: The buyer will be refunded in full once the cancellation is confirmed.

faqs.question: What happens if the product is out of stock after payment?
faqs.answer: The seller must inform the buyer immediately. The buyer will receive a refund if no suitable alternative is provided.

faqs.question: What happens if the seller does not ship the product?
faqs.answer: For in-app payments, the funds remain on hold and the buyer may request a refund after review.

faqs.question: Can I request a refund if a seller refuses to communicate?
faqs.answer: Yes. If the seller remains unresponsive and the order cannot proceed, you may request a refund through the platform.

faqs.question: What happens if the seller delivers later than promised?
faqs.answer: Buyers may request a refund or open a dispute if the delay is excessive or unjustified.

faqs.question: Can buyers request partial refunds?
faqs.answer: Partial refunds may be issued at the platform's discretion if only part of an order is problematic or for partially delivered orders.

faqs.question: Are delivery fees refundable?
faqs.answer: Yes, if the refund is due to platform or seller error. Fees may be non-refundable if the buyer cancels without justification.

faqs.question: Are transaction fees refundable?
faqs.answer: Platform and processing fees may or may not be refundable depending on the type of dispute and payment channel policies.

faqs.question: Will I be notified when my refund is processed?
faqs.answer: Yes. Buyers receive instant updates once a refund has been initiated and when Paystack confirms completion.

faqs.question: Are sellers notified of refunds?
faqs.answer: Yes. Sellers receive notifications whenever funds are refunded or reversed.

faqs.question: Can sellers dispute refund claims?
faqs.answer: Yes. Sellers may provide evidence to contest a refund, which the platform will review before finalizing.

faqs.question: Can the platform reverse a payment after releasing it to the seller?
faqs.answer: Reversals are extremely rare and only occur in severe cases of fraud or legal requirements.

faqs.question: What happens if the buyer pays twice by mistake?
faqs.answer: The duplicate transaction will be refunded once verified.

faqs.question: Can buyers request expedited refunds?
faqs.answer: Emergency refund requests are reviewed case-by-case, and priority may be given when justified.

faqs.question: What happens if a seller is banned after payment but before delivery?
faqs.answer: Funds are refunded to the buyer if the seller is removed due to policy violations.

faqs.question: Are refunds processed automatically?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed by the platform after verification. Automated triggers exist for certain clear-cut cases.

faqs.question: Are refunds processed faster for digital products?
faqs.answer: Yes. Digital product refunds are often processed immediately upon verification.

faqs.question: Are refunds processed faster for verified buyers?
faqs.answer: Yes. Verified accounts may experience faster refund processing.

faqs.question: Can the platform intervene in disputes?
faqs.answer: The platform can intervene only for transactions made through the in-app payment system. Direct or off-platform payments are not eligible for support.

faqs.question: How are disputed payments handled?
faqs.answer: The platform reviews evidence from both parties and makes a decision based on policies, delivery logs, and communication records.

faqs.question: What happens if the product delivered is different from the listing?
faqs.answer: Buyers can file a dispute. If the claim is verified, the buyer will receive a refund and appropriate actions may be taken against the seller.

faqs.question: What happens if the product delivered is damaged?
faqs.answer: Buyers can open a dispute. The platform will investigate, and if confirmed, the buyer will be refunded.

faqs.question: What happens if the product delivered is counterfeit?
faqs.answer: Verified counterfeit products qualify for a full refund, and the seller may face penalties.

faqs.question: What happens if the delivery service loses my item?
faqs.answer: If the buyer paid through the app, the platform investigates. Verified loss cases result in a full refund.

faqs.question: Can I still open a dispute after confirming delivery?
faqs.answer: In rare exceptional cases, disputes can be reviewed after confirmation if strong evidence is provided, subject to platform policy.

faqs.question: What proof is required for disputes?
faqs.answer: Depending on the issue, buyers may need to provide photos, videos, delivery confirmation codes, or signature confirmation.

faqs.question: How long does it take to resolve a payment dispute?
faqs.answer: Investigation times vary depending on complexity but typically range from 1-7 business days.

faqs.question: Does the platform cover return shipping during disputes?
faqs.answer: Return shipping policies vary. In cases where the seller is at fault, they may be responsible for return costs.

faqs.question: What happens if the seller provides fake tracking information?
faqs.answer: Such cases are investigated. If confirmed, the seller may face penalties, and the buyer may receive a refund.

faqs.question: Can I dispute a transaction paid directly to the seller outside the platform?
faqs.answer: No. Off-platform payments are not eligible for dispute resolution, refunds, or support.

faqs.question: Can sellers appeal dispute decisions?
faqs.answer: Yes. Sellers may provide additional evidence for review before the final decision is made.

faqs.question: How can I escalate a payment dispute if unsatisfied with the resolution?
faqs.answer: Contact platform support with additional evidence. Serious unresolved cases may be escalated to senior administration for review.

faqs.question: Can payment disputes be escalated to regulators?
faqs.answer: In extreme cases, unresolved disputes may be escalated to financial authorities or legal channels.

faqs.question: Are multiple disputes allowed for the same order?
faqs.answer: No. Only one active dispute per order is permitted to maintain clarity and fairness.

faqs.question: Are recurring disputes flagged for review?
faqs.answer: Yes. Repeated disputes by either buyer or seller are monitored for potential policy violations.

faqs.question: Can buyers or sellers request platform-assisted mediation?
faqs.answer: Yes. Both parties can request platform-assisted mediation to reach a resolution.

faqs.question: Can the platform intervene in disputes?
faqs.answer: The platform can intervene only for transactions made through the in-app payment system. Direct or off-platform payments are not eligible for support.

faqs.question: How are disputed payments handled?
faqs.answer: The platform reviews evidence from both parties and makes a decision based on policies, delivery logs, and communication records.

faqs.question: What happens if the product delivered is different from the listing?
faqs.answer: Buyers can file a dispute. If the claim is verified, the buyer will receive a refund and appropriate actions may be taken against the seller.

faqs.question: What happens if the product delivered is damaged?
faqs.answer: Buyers can open a dispute. The platform will investigate, and if confirmed, the buyer will be refunded.

faqs.question: What happens if the product delivered is counterfeit?
faqs.answer: Verified counterfeit products qualify for a full refund, and the seller may face penalties.

faqs.question: What happens if the delivery service loses my item?
faqs.answer: If the buyer paid through the app, the platform investigates. Verified loss cases result in a full refund.

faqs.question: Can I still open a dispute after confirming delivery?
faqs.answer: In rare exceptional cases, disputes can be reviewed after confirmation if strong evidence is provided, subject to platform policy.

faqs.question: What proof is required for disputes?
faqs.answer: Depending on the issue, buyers may need to provide photos, videos, delivery confirmation codes, or signature confirmation.

faqs.question: How long does it take to resolve a payment dispute?
faqs.answer: Investigation times vary depending on complexity but typically range from 1-7 business days.

faqs.question: Does the platform cover return shipping during disputes?
faqs.answer: Return shipping policies vary. In cases where the seller is at fault, they may be responsible for return costs.

faqs.question: What happens if the seller provides fake tracking information?
faqs.answer: Such cases are investigated. If confirmed, the seller may face penalties, and the buyer may receive a refund.

faqs.question: Can I dispute a transaction paid directly to the seller outside the platform?
faqs.answer: No. Off-platform payments are not eligible for dispute resolution, refunds, or support.

faqs.question: Can sellers appeal dispute decisions?
faqs.answer: Yes. Sellers may provide additional evidence for review before the final decision is made.

faqs.question: How can I escalate a payment dispute if unsatisfied with the resolution?
faqs.answer: Contact platform support with additional evidence. Serious unresolved cases may be escalated to senior administration for review.

faqs.question: Can payment disputes be escalated to regulators?
faqs.answer: In extreme cases, unresolved disputes may be escalated to financial authorities or legal channels.

faqs.question: Are multiple disputes allowed for the same order?
faqs.answer: No. Only one active dispute per order is permitted to maintain clarity and fairness.

faqs.question: Are recurring disputes flagged for review?
faqs.answer: Yes. Repeated disputes by either buyer or seller are monitored for potential policy violations.

faqs.question: Can buyers or sellers request platform-assisted mediation?
faqs.answer: Yes. Both parties can request platform-assisted mediation to reach a resolution.

faqs.question: Does Zunto offer delivery services?
faqs.answer: Yes. Delivery is available only when the buyer chooses the in-app payment method.

faqs.question: How do transactions work without in-app payment?
faqs.answer: For direct payments, Zunto is a meetup-based marketplace. Buyers and sellers communicate via chat to arrange a convenient and safe location to complete the transaction.

faqs.question: How do I choose a safe meetup location?
faqs.answer: Select well-lit, public locations such as shopping malls, bank premises, or areas with security personnel. Avoid isolated or unfamiliar locations.

faqs.question: Can sellers deliver items personally?
faqs.answer: Yes, if both parties agree. Discuss delivery arrangements, including any associated costs, within the chat before finalizing.

faqs.question: Can I use a ride or pickup service?
faqs.answer: Yes. Depending on the product and seller preference, you may arrange third-party pickup or delivery services. Coordinate details with the seller via chat.

faqs.question: Are delivery fees included in the payment?
faqs.answer: For in-app payments, delivery fees are displayed during checkout and added to the total payable amount.

faqs.question: Can I track my delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes. Real-time delivery tracking is available for in-app payment orders using supported courier partners.

faqs.question: What proof does the seller need to show for dispatch?
faqs.answer: Sellers may need to provide dispatch receipt, tracking number, courier confirmation, or delivery slip depending on the delivery method.

faqs.question: What happens if the buyer is not available during delivery?
faqs.answer: The delivery partner will attempt contact. If unsuccessful, the item may be returned and redelivery fees may apply.

faqs.question: What if I entered the wrong delivery address?
faqs.answer: If the order has not been dispatched, you can update the address. Once shipped, address changes may not be possible and could affect eligibility for refunds.

faqs.question: Can sellers ship internationally for in-app payments?
faqs.answer: Yes, provided the delivery option and fees are clearly communicated to the buyer before payment.

faqs.question: Is partial delivery allowed?
faqs.answer: Partial delivery is allowed only when agreed upon by both parties or clearly stated in the product listing.

faqs.question: What should I do if I feel unsafe during a meetup?
faqs.answer: Prioritise your safety. Leave the location immediately if you feel uncomfortable and report the user through the app.

faqs.question: Should I inspect items before paying?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Always inspect items thoroughly at the meetup to verify condition, functionality, and authenticity before completing payment.

faqs.question: Why should I use Zunto chat instead of exchanging phone numbers?
faqs.answer: The in-app chat protects your privacy and allows our system to detect fraudulent behaviour patterns. We recommend using Zunto chat until you are comfortable with the other party.

faqs.question: Can I send images in chat?
faqs.answer: Yes. Both buyers and sellers can share images within the chat for better product clarity and communication.

faqs.question: Why can't I send external links in chat?
faqs.answer: External links are restricted to protect users from phishing attempts and scam websites.

faqs.question: Why was my chat frozen or restricted?
faqs.answer: Chats may be temporarily frozen during investigations or when suspicious activity is detected. Contact support if you believe this is an error.

faqs.question: Can I block someone in chat?
faqs.answer: Yes. Blocking a user stops all communication and restricts their access to your profile and listings.

faqs.question: Why can't I message a seller?
faqs.answer: The seller may have disabled messaging, reached their chat limit, or may have blocked your account.

faqs.question: Are my messages encrypted?
faqs.answer: Yes. Zunto uses secure encryption to protect your conversations.

faqs.question: Does Zunto share my phone number with other users?
faqs.answer: No. Your contact information remains private unless you choose to share it. All initial communication occurs through our secure chat system.

faqs.question: Can I rate buyers and sellers?
faqs.answer: Yes. Ratings help build community trust. Both parties can rate each other after completing a transaction.

faqs.question: When can I leave a review?
faqs.answer: Reviews can be submitted after a transaction is marked as complete.

faqs.question: Can I edit or delete my review?
faqs.answer: Reviews can be edited for clarity but cannot be deleted unless they violate community guidelines.

faqs.question: Why don't I have any ratings yet?
faqs.answer: Ratings are earned through completed transactions. New users will accumulate ratings as they buy or sell successfully.

faqs.question: How do ratings affect my account?
faqs.answer: Higher ratings increase your credibility and visibility on the platform. Consistently low ratings may result in reduced visibility or account review.

faqs.question: What should I do if I receive an unfair review?
faqs.answer: You may respond to the review publicly or contact support if you believe the review violates guidelines or is fraudulent.

faqs.question: How do I stay safe while using Zunto?
faqs.answer: Verify items before payment, meet in safe public locations, use in-app chat, avoid sharing sensitive personal information, and trust your instincts.

faqs.question: How can I identify scam sellers?
faqs.answer: Warning signs include unusually low prices, pressure to complete transactions quickly, refusal to meet in safe locations, requests for advance payment, and reluctance to provide additional photos or information.

faqs.question: How can I identify scam buyers?
faqs.answer: Be cautious of buyers who request personal information, pressure you to ship before payment, or refuse to inspect items in person.

faqs.question: Can I report a user?
faqs.answer: Yes. Use the 'Report' button on the user's profile or within the chat to flag suspicious accounts or behaviour.

faqs.question: What happens when I report someone?
faqs.answer: Our moderation team reviews all reports and may issue warnings, temporary restrictions, or permanent bans depending on the severity of the violation.

faqs.question: What should I do if someone threatens me?
faqs.answer: Block the user immediately and report the account. If you feel in immediate danger, contact local authorities.

faqs.question: What should I do if I was scammed?
faqs.answer: Report the user immediately with all relevant evidence including chat screenshots and transaction details. While Zunto cannot guarantee recovery for off-platform payments, reports help us take action against fraudulent accounts.

faqs.question: How does the platform prevent fraud?
faqs.answer: All transactions are monitored using secure escrow, verification processes, AI-powered fraud detection, and manual reviews for unusual activity.

faqs.question: How are fraudulent sellers handled?
faqs.answer: If fraudulent activity is confirmed, the seller may face suspension, fund withholding, or permanent removal from the platform.

faqs.question: How are fraudulent buyers handled?
faqs.answer: Fraudulent buyers may have their accounts restricted or banned. Any ongoing transactions may be halted pending investigation.

faqs.question: What should I do if I notice unauthorized activity on my account?
faqs.answer: Contact support immediately. The platform will freeze pending transactions and investigate unauthorized activity.

faqs.question: What categories are available on Zunto?
faqs.answer: Zunto features categories including Electronics, Phones & Tablets, Fashion, Home Appliances, Vehicles, Property, Beauty, Gaming, Furniture, and more.

faqs.question: Can I request a new category?
faqs.answer: Yes. Submit category suggestions through the feedback option in the app. Popular requests are reviewed for future updates.

faqs.question: Why was my item moved to a different category?
faqs.answer: Moderators may recategorise listings to ensure accurate placement and improve discoverability for buyers.

faqs.question: How do I find specific items?
faqs.answer: Use the search bar with keywords or apply filters such as category, price range, location, condition, and seller rating to narrow results.

faqs.question: Why am I not receiving notifications?
faqs.answer: Ensure notifications are enabled for Zunto in your device settings. Also check that in-app notification preferences are configured correctly.

faqs.question: Can I mute notifications for specific chats?
faqs.answer: Yes. Open the chat, access settings, and select 'Mute' to silence notifications for that conversation.

faqs.question: Why did I receive a warning notification?
faqs.answer: Warnings are issued when your account activity triggers policy concerns or when other users report your account. Review the notification details and take any recommended actions.

faqs.question: What notifications will I receive?
faqs.answer: You may receive notifications for new messages, listing updates, price drops on wishlist items, payment confirmations, refunds, disputes, and account alerts.

faqs.question: Are all notifications logged?
faqs.answer: Yes. All notifications regarding payments, refunds, disputes, and account activity are securely logged for reference.

faqs.question: What happens if I break Zunto rules?
faqs.answer: Violations result in escalating consequences: initial warning, temporary restriction, and ultimately permanent ban for repeated or severe offences.

faqs.question: Is abusive behaviour allowed?
faqs.answer: No. Harassment, insults, hate speech, discrimination, and threats are strictly prohibited and will result in immediate action.

faqs.question: Can I appeal a ban or restriction?
faqs.answer: Yes. Contact Zunto Support with a detailed explanation of your situation to request a review of your account status.

faqs.question: Why was my account flagged?
faqs.answer: Flags are triggered when multiple users report your account or when automated systems detect suspicious activity patterns.

faqs.question: What are Zunto's community guidelines?
faqs.answer: Users must trade honestly, communicate respectfully, avoid prohibited items, refrain from fraudulent activity, and follow safe transaction practices.

faqs.question: Can sellers block buyers with a history of disputes?
faqs.answer: Yes. Repeat offenders may be restricted from transacting with specific sellers.

faqs.question: Are recurring offenders flagged by the platform?
faqs.answer: Yes. Buyers or sellers repeatedly filing disputes or engaging in fraud may have accounts restricted or suspended.

faqs.question: Why is the app not loading?
faqs.answer: Try clearing the app cache, ensuring you have the latest version installed, checking your internet connection, or restarting your device.

faqs.question: Why can't I upload photos?
faqs.answer: Ensure Zunto has permission to access your camera and storage. Also verify that your internet connection is stable.

faqs.question: Why does the app keep crashing?
faqs.answer: Crashes may result from an outdated app version, insufficient device storage, or unstable internet connection. Update the app and restart your device.

faqs.question: Why can't I log in?
faqs.answer: Common causes include incorrect credentials, account restrictions, or server maintenance. Reset your password or contact support if issues persist.

faqs.question: How do I update the Zunto app?
faqs.answer: Visit your device's app store, search for Zunto, and tap 'Update' if a new version is available.

faqs.question: Is Zunto available on both iOS and Android?
faqs.answer: Yes. Zunto is available for download on both the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

faqs.question: Can I use Zunto on a web browser?
faqs.answer: Yes. Zunto is accessible via web browser at our official website, in addition to our mobile apps.

faqs.question: Are in-app payments protected against technical failures?
faqs.answer: Yes. Failed or interrupted payments are automatically detected and resolved, with refunds issued as necessary.

faqs.question: How do I contact Zunto Support?
faqs.answer: Access the 'Help & Support' section within the app to submit enquiries or report issues.

faqs.question: How long does support take to respond?
faqs.answer: Our team typically responds within 24 to 48 hours, depending on enquiry volume.

faqs.question: Is live chat support available?
faqs.answer: Live chat support is planned for future updates. Currently, support is provided through in-app messaging.

faqs.question: Does Zunto have a customer service phone number?
faqs.answer: Phone support is not currently available. All support requests are handled through the app.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new features?
faqs.answer: Yes. We welcome user feedback. Submit suggestions through the 'Feedback' option in the app.

faqs.question: Will my feature suggestion be implemented?
faqs.answer: All suggestions are reviewed by our team. Implementation depends on feasibility, demand, and development priorities.

faqs.question: Can I request payment history reports?
faqs.answer: Yes. Both buyers and sellers can request detailed transaction reports via the platform for accounting purposes.
